Instruction: In a separate bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.

Place a skillet on medium heat. Gently grease the skillet's surface with butter. Pour in 1/8 cup of batter. Cook until bubbles form on the batter's surface; flip and cook until the bottom is lightly browned, about 1 to 2 minutes per side. Add more butter to the skillet between batches.
